mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO TB_WORKTICKET ( C_APPENDID , C_GUARDER_ID , C_END_PIC_ID , C_UNIT_NAME_ID , C_TYPE , C_END_TIME , C_CHANGE_ALLOW_DATE , C_PLANDATE_START , C_CREATE_DATE , C_GUARDER_NAME , C_CREATE_USER_ID , C_WORK_CLASS_PEOPLE , C_WORK_CLASS_MEMBER , C_IS_SET , C_STATUS , C_FLAW_CODE , C_END_ALLOW_NAME , C_CODE , C_ISTYPICAL , C_UPDATE_DATE , C_CONTENT , C_GROUP_ID , C_EQUIPMENT_NAME , C_ANNEX_ID , C_ADDRESS , C_END_ALLOW_ID , C_END_PIC_NAME , C_EQUIPMENT_CODE , C_CHANGE_ALLOW_ID , C_CHANGE_ALLOW_NAME , C_WORK_STATUS , C_PLANDATE_END,C_IDENTIFY,C_SAFE_NUM,C_SAFE_FLAG,C_CHANGE_ALLOW_IDEA,C_END_ALLOW_IDEA ) VALUES ( #{appendid},#{guarderId},#{endPicId},#{unitNameId},#{type}, #{endTime},#{changeAllowDate}, #{plandateStart} , #{createDate} , #{guarderName} , #{createUserId} , #{workClassPeople} , #{workClassMember} , #{isSet} , #{status} , #{flawCode} , #{endAllowName} , #{code} , #{istypical} , #{updateDate} , #{content} , #{groupId} , #{equipmentName} , #{annexId} , #{address} , #{endAllowId} , #{endPicName} , #{equipmentCode} , #{changeAllowId} , #{changeAllowName} , #{workStatus} , #{plandateEnd},#{identify},#{safeNum},#{safeFlag},#{changeAllowIdea},#{endAllowIdea} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.*,a.C_NAME as unitName ,b.C_NAME as groupName FROM TB_WORKTICKET t LEFT JOIN tp_sys_unit a on t.C_UNIT_NAME_ID=a.C_ID LEFT JOIN tb_team_group b on t.C_GROUP_ID=b.C_ID
